snippet: The crash of a military cargo plane fighting a South Dakota wildfire forced officials to ground seven other Air Force air tankers, removing critical firefighting aircraft from the skies.
abstract: Deadly crash of a military cargo plane fighting a South Dakota wildfire forces officials to ground seven other Air Force air tankers, removing critical firefighting aircraft from the skies during one of the most destructive wildfire seasons ever in the West.
lead_paragraph: The crash of a military cargo plane fighting a South Dakota wildfire forced officials to ground seven other Air Force air tankers, removing critical firefighting aircraft from the skies.

headline.main: Deadly Crash Limits Planes Fighting Fires
headline.print_headline: Deadly Crash Limits Planes Fighting Fires

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
